title: Saudi Arabia Private Beachside Oasis on Persian Gulf Coast
description: Indulge in serene beach moments at the contemporary InterContinental Al Jubail, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the majestic Persian Gulf coast of Saudi Arabia. Surrounded by lush gardens and acres or private beach, the hotel is the ideal launchpad to explore the beautiful nearby islands, with plenty of snorkelling, swimming and deep-sea fishing opportunities. Savour world-class cuisine at any of the hotel's decadent restaurants before discovering what the vibrant Al Jubail city has to offer.
location_description: InterContinental Al Jubail, an IHG Hotel
